name: Crazy Charlie
description:
/ Prototype game developed to get our hands on GameMaker Studio 1. /

/ Test for procedural generation and physics in GM. /

-------------------

Car race game set in the desert.

Inspired by 1990's game Nitro.

-------------------

Developped by the Wolpertingames team:

  • Xavier Lejeune: Programming
  • Hugo André: Vis Dev
  • Archonium: Music & sounds
